title: The Importance of Mental Health Awareness
content: Mental health awareness is crucial for improving our understanding of psychological well-being. By reducing stigma, encouraging open discussions, and providing resources, we can help individuals who are struggling to seek the help they need.
author: John Doe

title: The Role of Exercise in Mental Health
content: Regular physical activity is not only beneficial for physical health but also plays a significant role in improving mental health. Exercise can help reduce symptoms of depression and anxiety, improve mood, and enhance overall well-being.
author: Firasat

title: How Social Media Affects Mental Health
content: While social media can be a great tool for staying connected, excessive use can negatively impact mental health. It can lead to feelings of inadequacy, anxiety, and depression, especially when individuals compare themselves to others online.
author: Emily Johnson
